title: The Night of the Shroud to Air on Italian Television
post:
We’ve been waiting for approximately one year.
My belief is Francesca Saracino may be able to persuade “Trinity Broadcasting Network (TBN)” to run the documentary on one of their TV channels here in the US.
As well, TBN has opened a massive structure, similar to Disneyland, called  “The Holy Land Experience” in Orlando, Florida, complete with a reconstruction of the Temple and many other biblical sites.  Check out the link and look at it on google images.
http://www.holylandexperience.com/ 
Surely this Christian conglomeration would run Francesca’s DVD.
Best,
author: Angel

title: The Night of the Shroud to Air on Italian Television
post: Angel,That would be a good idea, but have you noticed that the site makes no mention of the Church of the Holy Sepulchre? Looks like the people behind it do not know (or choose to ignore?) the fact that most Israeli archaeologists, heavyweights such as Bahat, Kloner, among them, consider this place to be the actual site of the burial of Jesus.
author: Louis
